COEW - Community order England / Wales
Community order made. The defendant must comply with the requirements (shown below) by 20/05/2026.
UPWR - Unpaid work. Requirement to be completed within 12 months.
Unpaid Work Requirement: Carry out unpaid work for 30 Hours within the next twelve months. This work will be supervised by the responsible officer.
